form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR ISSUANCE OR EXTENSION OF PERMIT TO REENTER THE UNITED STATES, FORM I-133 ( (Rev. 9/27-75)N

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/18/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form approved. Immigration and Naturalization Service OMB No. 43-R0052 APPLICATION FOR ISSUANCE OR EXTENSION FFE OF FREESTAMP ECTED OF PERMIT TO REENTER THE UNITED STATES AMERICAN CONSULATE GENER as provided in section 223 of the Immigration and Nationality Act BOMBAY, INDI Use typewriter or print in block letters with ball-point pen. SEP 29 1978 Date: AC and issuance I hereby apply for (check one) of Permit to Reenter extension FAMILY NAME (Capital Letters) FIRST 1. YOUR NAME MIDDLE SITLANI NARAINDAS TOLARAM IMPORTANT: must your Alien Registration application You the United submit if States you conflict above. Receipt Card you C/O with this checked 'ssuance If IN CARE OF SITLANI RANJIT. NARAINDAS checked "Extension" you must submit the reentry permit you wish (No. and to have extended. MAILING Street) (Apt. No.) ADDRESS 35 NORTH WAY ALIEN REGISTRATION NUMBER IN U.S. (City) CHAPPAQUA (State) (ZIP Code) N.Y. 10514 A. 34 733 884 FILL IN ITEMS 2 THROUGH 6 ONLY IF APPLICATION IS FOR ISSUANCE OF REENTRY PERMIT 2. DATE OF BIRTH (Month, Day, Year) COUNTRY OF BIRTH COUNTRY OF CLAIMED NATIONALITY COLOR OF EYES COLOR OF HAIR HEIGHT FEET INCHES VISIBLE MARKS AND SCARS 3. I DID DID NOT REGISTER FOR SELECTIVE SERVICE 4. FILL IN THE ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK AS TO first ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE OR ADJUSTMENT TO ERMANENT RESIDENT STATUS NAME UNDER WHICH ADMITTED OR ADJUSTED PORT OF ARRIVAL OR OCATION OF DATE OF ARRIVAL OR DATE AS OF IMMIGRATION OFFICE WHICH WHICH ADJUSTMENT OF STATUS GRANTED ADJUSTMENT WAS GRANTED FILL-IN REMAINING ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK ONLY IF YOU DID NOT ACQUIRE PERMANENT RESIDENCE THROUGH ADJUSTMENT MANNER OF FIRST ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE (Name Vessel, Airline, etc.) FATHER'S NAME AT TIME OF YOUR ARRIVAL MOTHER'S MAIDEN NAME 1848 5. FILL IN THE ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK AS TO last ARRIVAL IN U.S. (Exclude any re-entry after an absence of less than six months in Canada or Mexico.) NAME UNDER WHICH ADMITTED PORT OF ARRIVAL DATE OF ARRIVAL NAME OF VESSEL, AIRLINE OR OTHER MEANS OF CONVEYANCE - GER KOR 6. PORT OF proposed DEPARTURE FROM UNITED STATES DATE OF proposed DEPARTURE LENGTH OF INTENDED ABSENCE ABROAD NAME OF TRANSPORTATION COMPANY IF DEPARTURE IS TO BE BY VESSEL, GIVE NAME OF VESSEL FILLINITEM 7. ONLY IF APPLICATION IS FOR EXTENSION OF REENTRY PERMIT 7. List all countries visited since your last departure from the United States, in the order visited DATE & PORT OF LAST DEPARTURE FROM U.S. NONE - CAME DIRECT FROM y. To BOMBAY By AIR-INDIA 5th DEC: 1977 NEW-YORK 8. FILL IN ITEM 8 ONLY IF YOU HAVE PREVIOUSLY OBTAINED A PERMIT TO REENTER ISSUANCE DATE OF LAST PERMIT LOCATION OF IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION OFFICE ISSUING LAST PERMIT (City and State) SCOPLES OFTWO LETTERS (1) FROM my SON MY LAST PERMIT JUNE 20-1978 Nyc is ATTACHED and (2) FROM MR. RICHARD ATTACHED HEREWITHER Your INFORMATION IS NOT ATTACHED IF THE PERMIT IS NOT ATTACHED STATE REASON: NOT APPLICABLE IF PERMIT IS ATTACHED STATE EXPIRATION DATE NOVEMBER3-1978 ALL APPLICANTS MUST FILL IN ITEMS 9 THROUGH 20, INCLUSIVE 9. PRESENT OCCUPATION RETIRED FROM BUSINESS NAME and ADDRESS OF EMPLOYER SOCIAL SECURITY ACCOUNT NUMBER NOT APPLICABLE NOT APPLICABLE ISK 10. BOTH My WIFE MRS: GOPI.
